regen.absent_element: error handling for interoperability issues with IBLS and CARS
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall handle errors and anomalies that occur during interoperability with the Integrity Beacon Landing System (IBLS) and the Common Automated Recovery System (CARS)

regen.absent_element: abort criteria and procedure for launch and recovery operations
regen.new_specification: The system shall define and implement specific abort criteria and procedures for automatic launch and recovery operations to ensure safe and reliable termination of these tasks when necessary.

regen.absent_element: abort criteria and procedure for launch and recovery operations
regen.new_specification: The system shall establish clear criteria and procedures for aborting automatic launch and recovery operations.

label: The TCS shall initiate abort the launch and recovery procedures if required.
absence: action of aborting the launch and recovery procedures
